The project aims to implement a range of technologies and measures to enhance fuel efficiency and reduce carbon emissions. Central to this initiative is the distribution of Improved Cookstoves (ICS), such as the Tsinjoharena models, which are designed to reduce smoke, improve fuel efficiency, and decrease particulate matter and carbon emissions.
